definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: captive (cf. Rahlfs:[[עני]] u. [[ענר]] in Psalm., 63);—[[בַּת־חִיּוֹן]] ´[[שׁ]]: Is 52:2 (Bev:JPhII. xcii (1888) p.127 ingeniously, [[שְׁבִי הַבַּת]], ´[[וגו]]: cf. ‖[[שְׁבִי ]], v:a and, on ´[[הַבּ]]:, La 2:13; read also [[יְרוּשָׁלָָםִ]] ´[[שׁ]]: v:a (for [[שְׁבִי]] ) Oort Bu Du Che:HPt Marti.
